attributes.action: removing the profit element out of the equation -of what your doctor prescibes for you.
attributes.additional_details:
There are very powerful therapies out there  which are just not being used because there is no profit in them.

Drug companies pay  for  most testing  and will only  and I mean only look at  treatments, which show the promise of good deal of a profit, --they will actively dismiss any therapy OR PRODUCT  which does not have profit potential.
 Thus your doctor  will only  recommend therapies that have been tested .
These may not be the best and in 2004 5000 hospital beds were taken up from adverse reaction to drugs .



 So we are calling for a dept to be set up so that promising therapies are looked at, tested and so that doctors can recomend them to their patients .
